lyrics.en:
Amazing grace! How sweet the sound
That saved a wretch like me...
lyrics.yo:
Oore ofe iyanu! Bawo ni ohun naa dun to
Ti o gba elese bi emi la...

lyrics.en:
Blessed assurance, Jesus is mine!
Oh, what a foretaste of glory divine!
lyrics.yo:
Ileri ayo, Jesu temi!
Ohun ti n yo mi ni ogo nla!
